sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MapGoogleImpl</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MapGoogleImpl</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MapGoogleImpl = Class.create();
MapGoogleImpl.prototype = {
    initialize: function(prefix) {
        this.prefix = prefix;
    },

    _createGoogleRequest: function(srcArray, destArray, useTraffic) {
        var geoSourceArray = srcArray.map(function(latLonData) {
            return new SNC.GeoLatLong(latLonData.latitude, latLonData.longitude, latLonData.id);
        });

        var geoDestinationArray = destArray.map(function(latLonData) {
            return new SNC.GeoLatLong(latLonData.latitude, latLonData.longitude, latLonData.id);
        });

        var geoRouting = new SNC.GeoRouting();
        var geoAgent = new SNC.GeoAgent(this.prefix);
        geoRouting.useGoogleMapsApi(true);
        geoRouting.setAgent(geoAgent);
        if (useTraffic) {
            geoRouting.setUseTraffic(true);
            geoRouting.setTrafficModel("best_guess");
            geoRouting.setDepartureTime("now");
        }

        return {
            geoSourceArray: geoSourceArray,
            geoDestinationArray: geoDestinationArray,
            geoRouting: geoRouting
        };
    },
    getTravelTimeDistancesGoogle: function(srcArray, destArray, useTraffic, concatedRequest) {
        var action = 'getTravelTimeMatrixPadded';
        var locationElementCounts = srcArray.length * destArray.length;
        var googleResponse = {};
        var googleRequest = this._createGoogleRequest(srcArray, destArray, useTraffic);
        var geoRouting = googleRequest.geoRouting;
        var geoSourceArray = googleRequest.geoSourceArray;
        var geoDestinationArray = googleRequest.geoDestinationArray;
        var distMap;
        if (gs.nil(concatedRequest) || concatedRequest == false) {
            distMap = geoRouting.getTravelTimeMatrixPadded(geoSourceArray, geoDestinationArray);
        } else {
            action = 'getTravelTimeMatrixPaddedGoogleAPI';
            distMap = geoRouting.getTravelTimeMatrixPaddedGoogleAPI(geoSourceArray, geoDestinationArray);
        }
        googleResponse.matrixObject = j2js(distMap);
        googleResponse.logData = {
            isRevertedToCrow: geoRouting.getRevertedToCrowValidation(),
            location_elements_count: locationElementCounts,
			actionName: action
        };

        return googleResponse;
    },

    type: 'MapGoogleImpl',
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-07-19 21:20:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>06b90983c3443110a0cd587c1f40dd6f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MapGoogleImpl</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Geolocation" source="com.snc.geolocation">c57b1ebb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d43a2</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_06b90983c3443110a0cd587c1f40dd6f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-08-22 20:41:56</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
